sentence.Network_en: The town has a desolate visage.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个镇子呈现出一片荒凉.

sentence.Network_en: A blithe heart makes a blooming visage.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... verbiage 冗词，赘语 visage 面貌 dotage 老年昏惯.
v字仇杀队那段都是V的经典台词 ... ) vicissitudes - 变迁 ) visage - 面容 ) veneer - 外表,面饰.
暗黑II代码对照表 - 帝睥流芒的日志 - 网易博客 ... GNARL / 节 VISAGE / 脸 CREST / 顶饰.
欧美流行音乐指南(共2册增订版)-博库网 ... VIRGIN RECORDS 维真唱片公司 VISAGE 容貌 WAITS,TOM 汤姆·韦茨.

list.abs: 上班族英语成语等 ... 74、Blooming visage. 容光焕发 76、Hungry dogs will eat dirty puddings. 饥不择食.
眼霜　Gel yeux面膜　Masque visage磨砂膏　facial scrub
感同身受（Sympathetic Visage）[幻术]快速削弱敌人能量与怒气，防止他们使用一些技能。祝福灵气（Blessed Aura）让你的加持维 …
emerge with a new visage in the East ., 以新的面貌出现在世界的东方.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Old French from Latin visus 'sight', from videre 'to see'

means.word_mean: 1. the human face (`kisser' and `smiler' and `mug' are informal terms for `face' and `phiz' is British)
2. the appearance conveyed by a person's face;

auth_sentence.content: A large man, wide of jowl and dark of visage.
auth_sentence.res_content: A large man, wide of jowl and dark of visage.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A large man, wide of jowl and dark of visage.

auth_sentence.content: We see the image of the Virgin Mary in a tortilla or the visage of Mother Teresa in a cinnamon bun.
auth_sentence.res_content: We see the image of the Virgin Mary in a tortilla or the visage of Mother Teresa in a cinnamon bun.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We see the image of the Virgin Mary in a tortilla or the visage of Mother Teresa in a cinnamon bun.

auth_sentence.content: Your wearing it says "my visage is deficient, and must be carefully enhanced" and worse, it says you know it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Your wearing it says "my visage is deficient, and must be carefully enhanced" and worse, it says you know it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Your wearing it says "my visage is deficient, and must be carefully enhanced" and worse, it says you know it.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 名词或动词后缀,表示"状态,总称"; 2. [做的]状态,过程; 3. 名词后缀,表示"费用"; 4. 名词后缀,表示"场所,物品"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dam+age状态,总称→n.损害,伤害
carry携带,运送+age费用→carriage运费
post邮件+age费用→n.邮资
rail铁路+age费用→n.铁路运输,铁路运费
tow拖+age费用→n.拖[船,车]费
water水+age费用→n.水路运输,水运费
anchor铁锚+age场所,物品→n.停泊地点;抛锚地点
append附加+age表示名词→n.附加物
bever饮,喝+age场所,物品→n.[水,酒等之外的]饮料
cot小床,小屋+age场所→cottage村舍,小屋
herit继承+age场所,物品→n.遗产,继承物;传统
hermit隐居士+age场所,物品→n.隐居处
lug拖拉+age物品→需要拖运的物品→luggage行李,皮箱
vill茅屋+age场所,物品→n.村,村庄
wreck残骸+age场所,物品→n.残骸,碎片

stems_affixes.value_cn: 优点,长处,有利条件;利益,好处
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad+vant=van前卫,先锋+age状态,总称→n.优点,长处,有利条件;利益,好处
dot打点,打盹+age状态,总称→n.老年糊涂,溺爱
drain排干+age状态,总称→n.排水;下水道
foli叶+age状态,总称→n.叶子[总称]
marry结婚+age状态,总称→marriage
mile英里+age状态,总称→n.里程
patron赞助人+age状态,总称→n.赞助,惠顾
percent百分比+age状态,总称→n.百分率
pilgrim朝圣+age状态,总称→n.朝圣
short短+age状态,总称→n.不足,缺乏
ton吨+age状态,总称→tonnage吨位
verbi=verb词语+age状态,总称→词的状态→冗长
vis看+age状态,总称→n.脸,面貌
pill抢夺+age状态,总称→n.&v.抢劫,掠夺
en进入+vis看+age[做的]状态→进入看的状态

sentences.en: A blithe heart makes a blooming visage.
The town has a desolate visage.
sentences.cn: 这个镇子呈现出一片荒凉。
